CustomField.description: If Date of Death is blank, display only Death Date Null value. If Date of Death Date is completed display date and do not display Death Date Null.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISNULL(CMPL123CME__B2_Date_of_Death__c),ISBLANK(CMPL123CME__B2_Date_of_Death__c)) , TEXT(CMPL123CME__B2_Death_Date_Null__c), LPAD(TEXT(MONTH( CMPL123CME__B2_Date_of_Death__c)),2,'0') & "/" & LPAD(TEXT(DAY( CMPL123CME__B2_Date_of_Death__c)),2,'0') & "/" & TEXT(YEAR( CMPL123CME__B2_Date_of_Death__c)))
CustomField.label: EMDR B2 Date of Death
